job_title: IT Operations Manager in Auburn, CA
pros: I've been with Chapa-De for 6 months. Benefits are incredible, but the people and culture are equally amazing. Chapa-De isn't one of those companies that says the things they're supposed to say and then forgets about them. The company leadership lives our values and maintains encouraging, supportive and open communication with all of our staff. There is genuine concern and attention to employee happiness and work/life balance, as well as patient care. I have found the staff at all levels genuinely care about the work they're doing and the people they're helping. I go to work feeling great because I know that what I'm doing really helps people and that is much more than most can say. This may impact me more than others as my entire career had been in the for profit sector, so the primary concern was always making money. The change to a focus on helping people is exactly how I want to finish my career and Chapa-De is giving me that opportunity. I really can't say enough good things about working there. For me, a dream job.
cons: Honestly, none. I sat here thinking that I HAVE to put down at least one con or this review will look fake. Well, I simply don't have any. Sorry

job_title: PSR I in Grass Valley, CA
pros: 100% paid Medical, Dental and Vision. Retirement and life savings. 30 days of chiropractic, accupuncture and physical therapy a year. Start with 27 days paid time off. There’s more, I just can’t remember all of it.
cons: Corporate feeling from employee stand point. Really stressful work in terms of patient demographics.

pros: Benefits are great pay is okay

job_title: Patient Services Supervisor in Auburn, CA
pros: They do everything they can to keep us working during the pandemic. We have been receiving bonus checks ever year at Christmas time. You just generally feel that your matter.

review_title: Looking for a job somewhere else.
job_title: Dental Reception in Grass Valley, CA
pros:
Very nice facility.  Full benefits for full time employees.  Supervisors are very understanding
of family responsibilities and it is very easy to get time off.
cons:
Very low hourly pay compared to similar jobs in the area.  Our patients are difficult to
deal with at times. Co-workers are not happy to be there so the work environment is
not enjoyable.  Employees are not working as a team.

pros: They pay 100% of the employee Medical, Dental, Vision.
cons: Very political environment, alot of negativity and backstabbing. Supervisors have no training and are often incompetent. There is a "pretend to be happy but really be tense and on edge" mindset at Chapa-De.

job_title: Medical Assistant in Grass Valley, CA
pros: Full benefits, caring staff, family oriented leadership team.  It is one of the best offices I've ever worked. They have a strong medical team that gives quality care  to all of their patients.
cons: All positions are 40hours a week. Would love the opportunity to work less.
